attributes.action: Legalise the wearing of dark, tinted and iridium visors on motorcycle full face safety helmets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently only clear visors are legal. This can be dangerous in the summer months when the sun is shining often low in the sky and dazzling riders. Sunglasses are allowed but bring their own problems such as they can shatter in a crash and damage the eyes with broken glass, wire etc
